ComicInfo.Summary:
Foxy new mom can't bear to be away from baby even for a short evening out of her clothes. Schlubby hubby was just hoping to get out for some 'relaxation' and fun, but calls it an early night and heads back home in hopes for some head.
Once home, hubby storms off to watch the boob-tube, but thankfully the babysitter stays to lend mom an understanding and compassionate shoulder to slobber on.
